price: ߏ߬ ߟߎ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߘߊߞߊ߲ ߝߊ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߸ ߊ߬ ߣߴߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߛߌߟߊ߲߫ ߠߊ߫ ߟߏ߲ ߠߊ߫ ߡߍ߲ ߞߏ߫ ߖߎ߮ ( ߟߎ߬ ) ߦߋ߫ ߖߍ߲ߛߍ߲߫ ߠߊ߫
arabic: يُوفُونَ بِٱلنَّذۡرِ وَيَخَافُونَ يَوۡمٗا كَانَ شَرُّهُۥ مُسۡتَطِيرٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: yūfūna bil-nadhri wayakhāfūna yawman kāna sharruhu mus'taṭīran
